messages.message:
Also a follow-up on the issues when running in Python 3 â€” do you all have a list to share there? Happy to capture those details and turn them into JIRA tickets.

Certainly agree the Python 3 transition is painful, but I see this as more of a Post-mortem around our UAT process, as these issues should get caught during our User Acceptance Testing.

Could people help provide features and issues which are not working in Python 3? I can follow-up with each individual eng owner to make sure we have appropriate UAT testing to ensure that we flag these issues at each release testing time
